title: MCX Onboarding Workshop Canvas
description: A structured canvas for CX leaders to co-design onboarding strategies for machine customers. Use in workshops with CX, tech, risk, and product teams.

sections.title: 1. Agent Types
prompts: What kinds of machine customers might we onboard?
Examples: delegated bots, autonomous systems, API consumers, connected devices.

sections.title: 2. Permissions Mapping
prompts: What will these agents need to do?
What data or services will they access?
What permission levels should be applied?

sections.title: 3. Trust Signals
prompts: How do we assess trust for each type of agent?
What historical behavior, credentials, or external validations matter?
How do we design for escalating trust over time?

sections.title: 4. Onboarding Journey Design
prompts: What does the onboarding flow look like for this agent?
Where do trust, authorization, and usability intersect?
How do we make this journey explainable and auditable?

sections.title: 5. Risks and Controls
prompts: What could go wrong in machine onboarding?
What control mechanisms, overrides, or fail-safes are needed?

sections.title: 6. Next Steps and Owners
prompts: What experiments or prototypes can we run?
